EYE OF MIDNIGHT

The Sentinel becomes Slowed but can take Overwatch 1/turn, instead of 1/round. Once activated, this effect lasts until it is deactivated as a quick action.

GUARDIAN

Allied characters can use the Sentinel for hard cover.

IMPALER

When the Sentinel hits with Overwatch, their target must pass a Hull save or become Immobilized and Jammed until the end of their next turn.

BODYGUARD

The Sentinel chooses an allied character within range 5 as their ward and gains the Reflexive Blow reaction.

REFLEXIVE BLOW

Trigger: Someone attacks the Sentinel’s ward.
The Sentinel first attacks the inciting character with Overwatch.

PUNISHER AMMUNITION

Characters damaged by the Sentinel’s Overwatch attacks also become Slowed until the end of their next turn.

GRUNT

CHAFF

The Grunt has 1 HP and can’t gain more. Unlike other characters, they never take damage when they succeed on a save – regardless of the weapon or system used – but otherwise take damage normally.

WEAK

The Grunt can never have more than 1 Structure and 1 Stress, and they are immediately destroyed when they take heat from any source other than their own systems and weapons.

RANK AND FILE

The Grunt can’t take the Veteran, Squad, Elite, or Ultra templates.
